text: Miriam Isabel Palacios Piña (born December 18, 1933 in Victoria and died March 18, 2013 in Santiago, Chile) was a Chilean actress. == Filmography == * 1983 : El 18 de los García * 1987 : Sussi * 1988 : Hechos consumados * 1988 : Consuelo * 1990 : Caluga o menta * 1990 : Dos mujeres en la ciudad * 1991 : La niña en la palomera * 1994 : 'Los náufragos * 1994 : Amnesia * 1997 : Pasión gitana * 1999 : El chacotero sentimental * 2000 : Coronación * 2006 : Las golondrinas del Altazor == Other websites == * Category:1933 births Category:People from Araucanía Region Category:Chilean television actors Category:Chilean stage actors Category:Chilean movie actors Category:2013 deaths
title: Miriam Palacios
